QuestData.Title: Head for the Mills
QuestData.Description: The Agamand Mills, to the west, have been lost to the Scourge. The Agamand family has been slain, and the entire residence has been claimed by the Scourge.$b$bThis is probably the largest Scourge outpost in Tirisfal, $n. If you think you're enough of a $c, head up there and speak with Coleman Farthing. He's been doing his best to take the land back, and he'll need help. Just follow this road, it'll take you right to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Coleman Farthing at Agamand Mills in Tirisfal Glades.
QuestData.RewardText: Argh! Get back! Oh, you're not Scourge, are you?$b$bThank the Banshee Queen that you're here. I've greatly underestimated how bad it's gotten up here.
